node.name: PHP Class Generator
node.shortdescription:
The PHP class generator described below is integrated in the Java Code Generator at: http://www.sahits.ch/project/javacodegen/

PHP Class Generator can produce a PHP class based on an XML template and a database table.
Documentation on the XML file can be found at the project Home Page. The sources are also available there or from Sourceforge (http://sourceforge.net/projects/phpclgenerator/). This project is only supported as part of the code generation project.
node.body:
The PHP class generator described below is integrated in the Java Code Generator at: http://www.sahits.ch/project/javacodegen/

PHP Class Generator can produce a PHP class based on an XML template and a database table.
Documentation on the XML file can be found at the project Home Page. The sources are also available there or from Sourceforge (http://sourceforge.net/projects/phpclgenerator/). This project is only supported as part of the code generation project.
